articles.description: The S&P/ASX200 declined 0.9% on Tuesday despite a strong start. Materials, financials, and consumer discretionary dragged on small gains in communications.
articles.content: Australian shares made a promising start on Tuesday but faded badly as news of a growing coronavirus cluster in Brisbane added further uncertainty over the markets near-term outlook.The ASX 200 was q… [+2353 chars]
